title: 35 Cents
description: 35 Cents is the story of a straight, young, white boy growing up and coming of age as he hustles his way both through the gay community and the juvenile-detention system of South Florida in the late 1980s. It s also the amount he made when he turned his first trick at 13. Will he find home? Will he find love? All it costs is 35 cents.
author: Matty Lee
